column2: Sanchez Midstream Partners LP engages in the acquisition, development, and production of oil and natural gas properties and related assets. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas and currently employs 6 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: the exploration and production of oil and natural gas, and the midstream business, which includes the Catarina gathering system. The Exploration and Production segment explores for and produces crude oil and natural gas. The Midstream segment operates the gathering, processing and transportation of crude oil, natural gas liquids (NGLs) and natural gas. The exploration and production business includes oil and natural gas reserves located in the Eagle Ford Shale in South Texas and in other areas of Texas and Louisiana, as well as properties in the Mid-Continent region. The firm's total estimated proved reserves total over 11.6 million barrels of oil equivalent (MMBoe). The company owns approximately 1,992 net producing wells.
